category-def.name: org.codehaus.groovy.eclipse.sdk
category-def.label: Groovy Eclipse SDK (Optional)
category-def.description: Optional feature that provides source code for the Groovy-Eclipse plugin

category-def.name: org.codehaus.groovy.eclipse
category-def.label: Groovy-Eclipse (Required)
category-def.description: The required feature that provides Groovy support in Eclipse.

category-def.name: org.codehaus.groovy.compilers
category-def.label: Extra Groovy compilers (Optional)
category-def.description: The Groovy 1.7 compiler is installed automatically, but you may optionally install the Groovy 1.8 compiler as well.

category-def.name: org.codehaus.groovy.m2eclipse
category-def.label: m2e Configurator for Groovy-Eclipse (Optional)
category-def.description: Provides support for Groovy-Eclipse in m2eclipse. This is only compatible with m2eclipse v1.0 and greater.
